directions: Cut the bacon rasher into shreds and cook in a hot non-stick pan with the garlic clove. Stir in the wine vinegar and chickpeas. Toss in the baby leaf spinach, stirring until wilted. Season if you want to, then serve hot.
ingredients: 2-3 tbsp canned chickpeas, drained and washed
title: Hot chickpeas with spinach & bacon
